name: Dajafa.com 大家发网
tag_list: hyperlocal, chinese-community, chinese-society, local, events, activities, chinese-groups
description: Chinese Hyperlocal Site in North America
overview:
dajafa.com a hyper-local site for Chinese communities in North America.

dajafa.com provides local events and business directories to help people find and participate in community activities, find local service providers and places around the town.

Previously old Chinese migration created ethnic communities concentrated primarily in a couple of metro areas, e.g. New York, and Los Angels, etc. Now with flocks of new college students, and even high schoolers, new enterprise and personal oversea investments, new communities are created overnight in the past two years. A new era of Chinese migration to North America just began, with rapid expansion of Chinese communities.

The language and culture difference are major obstacles for new immigrants, which greatly undermined their productivity and competitive edge, and viewed by others as social skill deficits. dajafa.com is in simplified Chinese, aim to help people gain a strong foothold in their early days.

Dajafa.com is the first step to help Chinese people build and strengthen their communities, and increase the society awareness. We’re going to focus on helping new immigrants settle down and grow, and guiding younger students stay on track for a bright future. In the long run, Chinese people are going to take leading roles together to make United States a greatest country in the world.
